short_summary: English PCP Training for Canadian Armed Forces
description: The Canadian Forces Health Services Group requires a primary care paramedic (PCP) training program in English for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) medical technicians, on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

- **Title**: Request for Proposal (RFP) for English Primary Care Paramedic (PCP) Training
- **Reference Number**: WS3744507917-Doc3751385337
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3744507917
- **Publication Date**: November 15, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: [Ongoing]

## Tender Status

This tender is **Expired**.

## Business Requirements

The Canadian Forces Health Services Group requires a PCP training program in English for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) medical technicians on an as-and-when- requested basis.

## Procurement Details

- **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Cost-per-Point

## Contract and Trade Agreements

- **Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)**
- **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

## Tender Lead

- **Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Entity Contact**: Diane Reynolds (SPAC/PSPC), diane.reynolds@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Notes

Please refer to the tender description for detailed information. 

[Supply Chain Directors or equivalent shall be aware that a Notice of Required Documents must be completed by bidders] 

[RSW-PwyGI, Customs and Certificates Sections refers for Canadian Free Trade Agreement documentation referred processing protocol procedures] 

The Canadian Forces Health Services Group strongly encourages qualified contractors to submit a Proposal. 

The contact details below are intended for use by *interested tenderers* and are not mandatory for potential bidders:

* English-language RFP package: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14643006?extsite=MTQ2NDMwMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
